REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0008 reute h f BC-CITY-INVESTING-TRUST 03-03 0051

TEXT.TITLE: CITY INVESTING TRUST <CNVLZ> SETS CASH PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: City Investing Co Liquidating Trust said it declared a cash distribution of 25 cts a unit, payable April 10 to unit-holders of record April one. The trust last paid a stock distribution of General Development Corp <GDB> shares in July. Reuter
